string.value: #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says something has happened in #bHenesys#k.
You must go talk to #b#@1012109:##k in #bHenesys#k and find out what he's lost and help him retrieve it.
#b#@1012109:##k in #bHenesys#k has asked you for help in finding his Lost Book.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600 Able to proceed to 'Find the Lost Book' as next quest.

Did you get some rest? I'm sure it wasn't enough. It's all part of the learning process.\n\nWhat do you think a Thief is? A Thief isn't just someone who steals from others. A Thief is skillful, speedy, stylish, and strong. Don't you forget that! Let me give you a mission.
There is someone by the name of #b#p1012109##k in #bHenesys#k, and he's lost something.\n\nFirst, go and see him to find out what he's lost, and help him find whatever that might be.
Stop irritating me and just accept!
Ah, #b#p1052001##k in #bKerning City#k sent you. Nice to meet you! I'm #b#p1012109##k. Thank you for going out of your way to help me.
I lost my book...\n\nOh, I'm sorry. Look at me. That was rude of me. I know you've come from some faraway place, so you should really get some rest first. Come talk to me after you get some rest.
